info.sourceTextContent: Gabriel había adquirido en el Seminario esa dureza eclesiástica que hace del sacerdote un guerrero, más atento a los intereses de la Iglesia que a los afectos de la familia. Por esto no se impresionó gran cosa con la muerte de su padre.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Gabriel had acquired in the seminar that hardness church that makes a warrior priest, more attentive to the interests of the Church that the family's affections. For this is not impressed much with the death of his father
